channel.title: Cw caused me as king to change guard targets
channel.description: #### What happened? Was king, prince is outed, try to guard him, CW redirects me. This leads to my death as prince denies the testimony of the person receiving guards #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? King is occ immune, so shouldn't be redirected #### Steps to reproduce: get a king to send a guard to someone who a CW tornadoes #### Comments: really annoying when prince decides to exe me for it
